/usr/bin/c++ -g -Wall -rdynamic CMakeFiles/2.lighting__4.2.lighting_maps_specular_map.dir/src/2.lighting/4.2.lighting_maps_specular_map/lighting_maps_specular.cpp.o -o /repos/tutorials/learn-opengl/bin/2.lighting/2.lighting__4.2.lighting_maps_specular_map   -L/repos/tutorials/learn-opengl/lib  -Wl,-rpath,/repos/tutorials/learn-opengl/lib -lglfw -lX11 -lXrandr -lXinerama -lXi -lXxf86vm -lXcursor -lGL -ldl -lpthread -lfreetype -lassimp libSTB_IMAGE.a libGLAD.a  -ldl
